80 /*========== Definitions and Implementations for Unit Test ==================*/
81 
82 /** SPI data configuration struct for NXP MC33775A communication, Tx part */
83 static spiDAT1_t spi_kNxp775DataConfigTx[BS_NR_OF_STRINGS] = {
84  {.CS_HOLD = TRUE, /* If true, HW chip select kept active */
85  .WDEL = TRUE, /* Activation of delay between words */
86  .DFSEL = SPI_FMT_0, /* Data word format selection */
87  .CSNR = SPI_HARDWARE_CHIP_SELECT_2_ACTIVE},
88 };
89 
90 /** SPI data configuration struct for NXP MC33775A communication, Rx part */
91 static spiDAT1_t spi_kNxp775DataConfigRx[BS_NR_OF_STRINGS] = {
92  {.CS_HOLD = TRUE, /* If true, HW chip select kept active */
93  .WDEL = TRUE, /* Activation of delay between words */
94  .DFSEL = SPI_FMT_0, /* Data word format selection */
95  .CSNR = SPI_HARDWARE_CHIP_SELECT_0_ACTIVE},
96 };
97 
98 /** SPI interface configuration for N775 communication Tx part */
99 SPI_INTERFACE_CONFIG_s spi_nxp775InterfaceTx[BS_NR_OF_STRINGS] = {
100  {
101  .pConfig = &spi_kNxp775DataConfigTx[0u],
102  .pNode = spiREG1,
103  .pGioPort = &(spiREG1->PC3),
104  .csPin = 2u,
105  .csType = SPI_CHIP_SELECT_HARDWARE,
106  },
107 };
108 
109 /** SPI interface configuration for N775 communication, Rx part */
110 SPI_INTERFACE_CONFIG_s spi_nxp775InterfaceRx[BS_NR_OF_STRINGS] = {
111  {
112  .pConfig = &spi_kNxp775DataConfigRx[0u],
113  .pNode = spiREG4,
114  .pGioPort = &(spiREG4->PC3),
115  .csPin = 0u,
116  .csType = SPI_CHIP_SELECT_HARDWARE,
117  },
118 };
119 
120 /**
121  * Default multiplexer measurement sequence
122  * Must be adapted to the application
123  */
124 N775_MUX_CH_CFG_s n775_muxSequence[N775_MUX_SEQUENCE_LENGTH] = {
125  /* multiplexer 0 measurement */
126  {
127  .muxId = 0,
128  .muxChannel = 0,
129  },
130  {
131  .muxId = 0,
132  .muxChannel = 1,
133  },
134  {
135  .muxId = 0,
136  .muxChannel = 2,
137  },
138  {
139  .muxId = 0,
140  .muxChannel = 3,
141  },
142  {
143  .muxId = 0,
144  .muxChannel = 4,
145  },
146  {
147  .muxId = 0,
148  .muxChannel = 5,
149  },

156  .muxChannel = 7,
157  },
